content.detailedDescription:
at approximatly 9:07 pm i was in my front yard (which faces the east) watering my trees, when i looked up in the sky because of a light that had appeared at about 20-25 degrees southeast of where i was standing in abilene, texas. the light was a single light at first, then divided until there were five lights in a row turning on one after another from left to right. i realized exactly one year ago i had seen the same lights and actually recorded and had given a copy of this video to a local tv station which aired the video. i have recorded these lights multiple times over the past year. they first appeared on oct 6, 2010 and continued at exact times every day for a week in the following months: october, november, december, january, and february (starting in 2010 and ending in 2011). i had not seen them since then, until tonight. 

     these lights have always started at around 8:30 pm and continued until 9:00 pm every day until daylight savings time, after which, the time changed from 7:30-8:00 pm. another observation i made was that neighborhood dogs always started barking right before i would see the lights. these lights have appeared as singular lights and multiple lights, up to five at a time. these lights also appeared in multiple areas of the sky at same time.

     i know that several other people have seen these lights in the abilene, texas area. i also know that these lights could not be military flares due to the burn ban which has been in effect in our area for several months now. along with the burn ban, the fact that the wind was blowing at a constant 25 to 30 mph (along with gusts of up to 40 mph today), made it improbable in my mind and the minds of other eyewitnesses, that military flares could not have stayed in these exact formations as long as they did.
content.summary: At aprox.9:07 pm i looked up in sky when a light caught my attention.It was red orange in color then changed into five different lights in a row from left to right

content.detailedDescription: At 7:40pm on 10/06/2011 a large brilliant green meteor appeared from the ene & headed wsw. it came from the direction of tallahassee & appears to have crashed into the gulf of mexico off the coast of rosemary beach, fl. this was the largest, most awesome meteor i've ever seen & i'm in my 50's. probably a once in a lifetime event. the fireball was so bright it reminded my of the flash from an arc welder as it left an after image when i closed my eyes. i was saying goodnight to visitors while looking south & noticed a bright light to the upper left in my peripheral vision. i shouted for everyone to look up. but, only one other person saw it in time (about 10 seconds), and they marveled that it was green without me saying what color it was. it disappeared into the tree line on the horizon over the gulf.
content.summary: Bright green meteor

content.detailedDescription: Was taking pictures to document chemtrailing and seen object when looking at uploaded photos. didnt see object till looking at downloaded pics.  was only trying to capture chemtrails
content.summary: Captured in pics

content.detailedDescription:
I was 10 years old, living in a rural area of arkansas. i saw it in the sky hovering. it looked like a 'typical' saucer shape and silver color. i ran inside to find a parent. mother was in the shower so i ran back outside and yelled for my dad. i saw him come out of the barn. i had looked away for 2-5 seconds. i pointed to the sky as i looked back where it had been. it was gone. there were no clouds anywhere nearby. i think i remember what looked like windows (square shapes) around it. i remember standing there waiting to see if it would come out from behind a distant cloud. my dad looked confused, shook his head and walked off as he couldn't see anything where i was pointing.
 
i knew what a 'flying saucer' was because i watched 'lost in space' on tv so i was fascinated and excited when i saw it. i remember being kind of shocked when it just 'disappeared', feeling a little embarrassed that my dad gave me a weird look for pointing at an empty sky. he was far enough away from me that i couldn't immediately explain what i'd seen and he walked back into the barn after not seeing what i had seen. i felt disappointed that i didn't see it again. i'd hoped it would come out from behind a cloud, but i couldn't see how it would've gotten that far away in such a short time.

i have no idea how close it was, how big it was or how high off the ground, but i could see it clearly. there was no doubt in my mind that it was a flying 'saucer'.

i went back to the area as an adult around 1999 to 2001 (thereabouts) and drove around the area. one interesting thing was that a large area of adjacent land  was posted 'no trespassing' and i remember thinking it looked like a military area. i don't remember seeing anything that specifically said that though.
content.summary: Saw it hovering; ran inside to find parent; ran back out. still there. looked away for a couple seconds. when looked back it had disappeared. no clouds nearby.

content.detailedDescription: I have been trying to decide if i should report this or not.The time was between 1-1:30 am.I was sitting in the den and decided to open the back door to get the cool air in the room.There was an unusual bright light in the western sky that caught my attention.The entire neighbor-hood dogs were barking.There is always folks walking in the neighborhood but not at this hour and not every dog barking at the same time.My dogs were barking also.I was leaning out the door when a bright "strobe-like" light came down over the house...Happened in an instant.I leaned out to see what it was when i saw a tall,very thin dark shadow duct when it saw me and go back behind my van.I called my husband(he was in the living room watching tv) and told him what happened.We checked the yard and cars...Nothing!!This gave me a strange feeling as it did not look human.It was dark and we had a street light on.This figure was tall,very thin and bent forward.It was almost shadow-like and very fast movement.It was dark and the van was about 20 feet away,under a carport.The bright object had disappeared and no more strobe like light.Has this happened to anyone else?
content.summary: Bright white that would turn off and on then put out a strobe light beam when shadow was seen ducting behind family van

content.detailedDescription: We were driving home to raytown coming from blue springs on i-70. my wife was driving in a separate vehicle behind me. my 4 year old son was in the car with me. i looked to my left (south) approximately as we were approaching 291 hwy. and independence mall. i noticed a horizontal line of very bright lights off in the distance. it appeared that some sort of aircraft was hovering in the distance, but it caught my attention because the lights were brighter and in higher quantity than a typical a airplane. i continued to drive, but kept looking out the window to keep an eye on the aircraft. as i approached chiefs & royals stadiums, i had somewhat lost track of it, when suddenly my 4-year old son spotted the aircraft and got my attention. at that point it was close enough that i could see the underside of the craft and i could tell the it was triangular in shape and had 15-20 lights on the bottom side. i then merged onto 435 south headed towards raytown (right next to the stadiums), when all of a sudden the aircraft slowly flew directly over chiefs stadium and directly over my head. it was only a few hundred feet above my head at most. the chiefs stadium lights happened to be on although there was no event at the stadium that night from what i could tell. when the aircraft flew over my head i got a very good look at the enormous size of this aircraft and the bright multi-colored lights were unlike anything i had ever seen on an aircraft. the stadium lights also allowed me to see 3-4 streams of smoke coming from the back of the aircraft. however, the aircraft was completely silent when it flew over head. at this point, i was getting a bit nervous and/or excited because i had no idea what i was looking at. i have never been a believer in aliens or ufo's. i thought maybe it was a planned stadium fly over, but there was no event at chiefs stadium, so that didn't make sense. my only other guess is that it was some sort of top-secret military aircraft considering that we have a couple of nearby air bases. i then exited onto 350 highway and entered raytown, mo when my son again spotted the aircraft, which had done a 180 degree turn and circled back around. it was now flying east and then turned north and flew away from us back towards the stadiums. i was finally able to get my wife's attention and pointed it out to her as it was flying away. i went home for a brief moment, but then decided to chase it. i drove up to chiefs stadium, but there was no sight of the aircraft. within 30 seconds of arriving, they shut the lights off at chiefs stadium. i have tried to pass this off as some military experiment, but i have bee on edge ever since the sighting. it's good to know others saw the same thing, but i just want to know what it was.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Huge triangle ufo with 15-20 multi-colored lights on bottom flew directly over head

content.detailedDescription: Monday night my husband and three kids were driving around 730 at night and saw a weird large object far away with bright lights. i showed it to my husband and he said it was a spray plane. i said no way it is dark outside and the object is way too large and is over a city.  we went inside a store to eat ice cream. my son was so scared he called his uncle and told him.  we ate ice cream and came back outside. we were all looking for the object and saw it again.  i drove closer to it, my husband and i dont believe in ufo's.  we drove closer and it hovered over our car near down town lees summit mo.  it had bright white lights and green flashing lights.  my kids started crying and i started driving really fast. the object looked as large as a 747 or larger but was hovering so low.  again, i do not believe in ufo's but after that night i do.  my husband and i tried to forget about the event. the next day i went onto the news website and didnt see any other reports. so we dismissed it.  tonight on the news we saw all the other reports and now know 100% we saw a ufo!!!
content.summary: Ufo sighting in lees summit mo

content.detailedDescription: Me and 3 other freinds were outside at night just having a conversation in our neighborhood when i noticed a formation of bright white lights in the formation of a triangle hoovering over the tappan zee bridge on the westchester side. we watched the object hoover and the lights seemed to get brighte. after about 10-12 minutes the object either flew away or gained too much ascension and distance from us to see the lights any longer. my boy freind and i have seen similiar objects in our area and in nyc earlier this year and several years before this incident took place.
content.summary: Me and 3 friends saw a triangular shaped object with 3 bright white lights in each corner hoovering over the tappan z bridge

content.detailedDescription:
I was on the computer and my wife had just sat down out side.  she yelled my name and told me to look at this jet.  we both didn't know why she pointed it out she just felt like she should.  i think i had the impression it was a just a jet but it was flying kinda low and had to bright red blinking lights on each wing.  i figured i would grab my binoculars real quick and i did but they are broken so i just looked at the plane.  my wife and i can't remember the plane making any noise now but i am still not sure if it made noise or not.  i am also having a hard time remembering is apparent size even thought i had the impression it was flying low and was large.

suddenly a bright light appeared to the north east of us and heading south west toward the jet.  as the light approached the jet it was very bright (brighter than any planet) and with angular speed about twice that of the jet in a nice straight line but approaching the jet from a side angle not from behind.  as it approached it became very dim and hard to see.  it could still be seen barely till it reached the jet then disappeared.  by this time the jet was about as close as we would see it over head about 75 or so degrees above the horizon and to our south east.  we then spotted the light going the other way barely visible almost retracing its path.  it became a bit brighter but not much and disappeared over some trees in the horizon.  the jet just continued on its path toward the south west. 

i reported this on nuforc the day we spotted it but had some problems getting the data right so i decided to post this here
content.summary: Wife points out a jet approaching, then a light appears approaching the jet.

content.detailedDescription: I was headed to work, leaving my house a 2000hrs.  as i was driving around the on-ramp from manchester trafficway to i-70 westbound i noticed a very large craft in the sky over 435 & i-70 intersection.  there were blinking white lights blinking simultaneously on what seemed to be the outer edge.  i was going to pull over and take a video of it but i would have been late for work so i just kept driving away from the object watching it in my rear view mirror until it was out of sight.  the object seemed to be hovering periodically then moving at a slow rate and very low altitude.  i called my wife and told her about what i saw and said, just wait, you will see this on the news pretty soon and voila, here are all of these people describing the same thing and fox 4 news is going to report "strange lights in east kansas city area" tonight!
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: I-70 and manchester trafficway

content.detailedDescription: I was standing on my front porch and noticed what i was sure was a plane until the first larger object changed directions very fast. i thought a plane or helicopter can not change directions that quick, so i proceeded to watch and then a smaller object appeared coming toward the larger one and they met and kept going. the larger one was gray and shaped like a submarine. it would stop in mid air for a second then move forward and change again. it turned and flew slowly over my house then back to circling around they area. i watched it until it disappeared in mid air.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Two separate objects from different directions toward each other that was shaped oblong and changed directions abruptly with lights flashing.The larger one changed directions very quickly and went from west to east then circled over my house.     t

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting on my 3rd floor balcony and out of the corner of my eye i saw a light.  i thought it was a plane, since we live along a popular flight path but when i looked up it went so fast i knew it wasn't a plane.  it was almost like a large blue/green fireball and it fell from the sky at a very fast rate, almost like a meteor but there was no tail/trail.  it fell behind the tree line and i couldn't see it any more.

after that i scanned the sky near by for any sign of anything unusual.  i saw what looked like a regular star in the sky.  a few moments later i looked back in that direction and the start was no longer there.  it is a cloudless night.
content.summary: Blue/green fireball

content.detailedDescription:
Location: chester county, pa.
10/6/2011 approx. 7:45pm est

three very bright amber lights, very high altitude and moving very fast, two were parallel with the third trailing close behind.
in a very clear sky while directly overhead, they each winked out one at a time.
content.summary: 3 very bright amber lights moving very fast (east), clear sky, they each winked out

content.detailedDescription: I was overlooking the bay area at the lawrence hall of science laboratory sometime in july, the year 2000. my friend dave and i were laying on the benches in the back for about 30 minutes looking up at the stars. i noticed out of the corner of my eye the a section of stars seemed to disappear as if something was covering them from view. i focused on the area and noticed a traingular craft with a red light in the center of it, flying at a very low altitude (maybe 400ft above me) spinning slowly. it moved in a somewhat straight line, cruising by silently. i told my friend dave to look at this thing because i wanted to know that i wasn't halucinating or imagiming this thing. thinking back i also seem to remember that it had a small white light on each corner of the craft. it slowy cruised on it's way behind the hills beyond our sight. we sat there in shock thinking if the was some kind of ufo we just saw, and came to the conclusion that it had to be.
content.summary: Traingular in shape. red light in the center. white lights on all three corners. moved silently, spinning slowly.

content.detailedDescription: On the evening of october 4th, 2011 around 8:30 p.M. a buddy of mine and i were driving back from blue springs, mo towards lee's summit on woods chapel road (throught fleming park) when we observed a massive unidentified flying object hovering near the lee's summit airport.  the object was very large, probably over 100 foot in diameter and hovered about 300-500 feet above the ground.  the object made several banking manuevers and could change speed and direction very quickly.  at first we thought that it may have been several helicopters or planes flying in a tight pattern until the craft accelerated extremely quickly and at one point flew from our location at woods chapel and 470 several miles north towards i-70 and then came back south of our location in just a few seconds.  the object flew over us at one point and appeared to be a true triangle shaoe and made absolutely no noise.  the lights on the object were very odd and blinked and pulsated at random intervals.  the top of the craft appeared to have white lights with several larger blue ones mingled in but when the craft banked, the bottom of it was covered in red lights of varying size and brightness.  at one point all the lights went and we thought the craft had disappeared but in a few seconds they powered back on green but then gradually changed back to the colors described earlier.  during the observation, a small plane or helicopter with a bright spotlight shared airspace very close to the craft and appeared to be pursuing the object.  once the object decided to accelerate, the smaller plane was unable to keep up.  we observed the craft for the better part of 30 minutes and then it just disappeared.  one other note, as the craft flew near the lee's summit airport, a small plane took off from there and it looked like it nearly collided with the craft.  granted it is very difficult to judge distance and size at night with no true vantage points but what i have described above is how i saw it and has not been exaggerated.  i have had the opportunity to see the stealth bomber fly during the day and at night, and though my initial conclusion was that it was probably that type of aircraft, the more i put everything together and replayed the events in my head, the more i felt this was truly an unidetified flying object, and that i should share my experience on this website.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Ufo observed over blue springs, lee's summit, and missouri

content.detailedDescription: This sighting started as i was walking back from the grocery store with food for dinner that night.  i was fifteen years old, not driving at that point, and the store was not too far from the home i lived in.  this sighting occurred in the gardenville area of baltimore md, as i was walking along belair rd., which runs north and south from baltimore up to pa.  i was walking north from arizona ave. to hamilton ave., which then leads to kavon ave. which was the street i lived on.  kavon ave. ran parallel with belair rd., arizona ave. and hamilton ave. run perpendicular to belair rd.  at the corner of belair rd. and arizona ave., you can see well to the horizon as it is at the top of a hill, which then goes down into a valley at hamilton ave, then back up the hill to white ave.  the object i first saw, was coming through the atmosphere from southeast to northwest running diagonally across belair rd.  the object was a huge football shaped oval, with different colors in each quadrant, and a long fiery tail, with a burning corona around the entire object.  it reminded me of a toy called simon says, which has different colors in each quadrant.  i was stunned at what i saw, as i had never seen anything like that, and at that moment in time thought it was just a huge meteor coming through our atmosphere, although that thought changed as the next part of the story evolved.  after digesting what i had just seen, i was anxious to get home and tell my parents.  i then came down hamilton ave. to the base of my street (kavon ave.), and stopped to talk with two of my friends standing in front of their houses at the corner of hamilton ave. and kavon ave.  we were engaged in conversation about things in general, and me telling them what i had just experienced, when at treetop level a group, (8-9) discs flew over our heads.  they were yellowish/white in appearance, much like if you dimmed down a light bulb, or the headlight of trains of that time.  my two friends did not get a good look at them as their backs were to the discs.  by the time i directed them to look, the discs were gone, and my friends chalked it up to racing pigeons.  one of our neighbors had racing pigeons, but what i saw was not pigeons, and he never flew his birds at twilight, or at night, so i knew it was not his pigeons.  i then went to my house and told my parent what i had experienced. at that point i then noticed a neighbor from across the street watching the sky.  i joined him, and what we saw at that point was amazing.  groups of lights, (five to fifteen in number) in formation, not in v formation, or box formation, but in a group as if you were to throw a handful of pebbles and the formation they would stay in until gravity brought them down.  when they were higher they were moving quite quickly, and when lower, they moved slower as if looking for something.  these groups came in approximately twenty minute intervals, moving in the same direction as the very first object i had seen initially. this sighting occurred from just at twilight until after midnight.  the entire neighborhood had come out to watch at various times through this period.  we called the newspapers, and the police, only to be laughed at, so no one came out nor ever followed up to my knowledge.  then one loan light came from the north, stopped dead, made a right angle turn and with a great deal of speed left in the same direction as all the rest.  the way i would describe the entire experience would be as if one of our aircraft carriers was lost while all aircraft were deployed, and then they returned only to find the ship missing, then going on a search to find it.  i have never reported this until now.  it's just been a story i have carried with me my entire life.  i have a strong interest in the possibility of ufo's, and have never seen any reportage of this sighting from any source.  i thought it was time for this to be put on the record.  it has also been bugging me wondering if this is connected to the incident in kecksburg pa, which occurred around the same time, and in the same direction from baltimore.  i've never been able to connect the dots of the two sightings, but have always wondered if they were connected.
content.summary: This event occured starting with a huge oval firball streaking across the sky, followed by groups of lights when flying high were moving fast, when flying lower were much slower as if looking for something,

content.detailedDescription:
I live on the 8th floor of a high rise apartment building. i was sitting on my couch looking out the window when i saw a glowing ball of light hovering in the distance, right above the horizon. admittedly, i do see singular balls of light in that area occasionally, and often wonder what they are--helicopter maybe? they never venture near me, nor do they move much. however, last night it hovered stationary for a few minutes, then slowly moved to the right. at this point, my interest in the object piqued and i did not take my eyes off of it. i also began to grow excited, asking my husband to come look. it hovered briefly before slowly moving back to its initial position; about 30 seconds later, it slowly began to descend. as soon as my husband came to the window to look, it disappeared below the horizon-- the exact second he would have been able to see it! a few minutes later, it reappeared, shot straight toward me, and when it got relatively close (though, i could not discern its shape, approximate speed, or elevation), it flashed. i really feel like the flash was the object acknowledging me, or even saying hi. as mu husband was standing up to look,  it shot away. he did see it though before it disappeared again below the horizon. 
i should note that my windows were open and it was quiet during this time both inside my apartment (no music or tv or surrounding noise) and outside (minimal traffic). i was listening for helicopter sounds, and can assert that i did not hear any. and for that matter, i have never seen a helicopter adhere to that kind of flight path.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Hovering, glowing ball of light

content.detailedDescription: [link moved to field investigator section/cms/tg]
content.summary: Link to video of ufo over missouri october 4, 2011

content.detailedDescription: If you want to know more email me i will tell you more
content.summary: Flash in sky then saw a clear object with a dome pass overhead

content.detailedDescription: I was asleep in bed in an upstairs bedroom. i was awoke by something unknown and went to the bedroom window and saw a disc shaped object on the back lawn. object was approx 6 - 10 feet in dia and had lights and a dome, a classic saucer shape in fact. i stood and watched it for some time and returned to bed as i thought i was dreaming. it was only in the morning when i went outside that i realised it was not a dream as there on the ground was a perfect circle of discoloured grass. my father also witnessed the evidence in the morning.
content.summary: I awoke in the night and saw a disc object on back lawn

content.detailedDescription:
Daughter was looking outside window (age 2) and said bright light in sky, i looked out and saw egg shaped bright orange object, watched this for around 10mins very very bright as bright as sun in fact looked like mini sun, ran upstairs to my wife to tell her and as i looked out of the window again watched as the object shot down and to the side and landed on the salt marshes that are next to our house maybe less than a mile away but with no obstructions in the way i had a clear view of the craft below us, by now a helicopter (large noise) came up the estuary towards the landed object, i say helicopter but could only see a red  and white light and hear the noise of a helicopter, this shone a light or beam at the ground all the way towards the landed object and went straight towards it, but when it did reach it the light went off and the helicopter or what ever it was went back in the same direction it had come from, this happened quite a few times.  

all the time this was happening the landed object kept sending huge pulsating lights towards my house, a different colour every 5 seconds (blindly bright), another object was in the sky directly opposite the landed object and kept getting brighter then dimmer and seemed to approach the helicopter each time it went towards the landed object as if to warn it off. after the 1st 20mins of watching and finally decided it was not a plane crash, i went and got my camera and binoculars (very powerful)  i took around 35 pictures before the camera was full.

i expected lots of other people to have seen this event but it was never reported in the media, i contacted the police to ask if it was there helicopter it was not, i contacted the coast guard it was not them, i contacted 2 local rat bases it was not them, i went on local radio asking for witnesses but none came forward, so it's just me my wife and my daughter who saw it but i have the pictures and i think someone should see them!!!!!
content.summary: Orange egg shape as bright as sun hovering outside window, then shot down landed other ufos around

content.detailedDescription:
I was watching sky looking for the star like object moving we have been seeing lately when i noticed one moving much slower then normal.

as i watched it move on an east to west heading i noticed what looked like white was more blue in color, then it started fading to red, back to blue and kept this up.

i am now staring at this object and find i cannot look away. it stops moving and hovers for a couple seconds. the object then jumps north and immediately back to where it was hovering, then does this same movement to the south and then again to the east. returning to where it was hovering. 

feeling of fear came over me(and i don't get afraid) and i could not stay there any longer to watch it because it was almost overhead and i didn't want them to see me so i went in the house(strange feeling for me).

i returned 15 minutes later and the object is gone, i sat there for a while but it never returned. i was watching time closely while this event happened and it lasted for maybe 1o minutes.

i have seen objects in the sky before but none of them every made me feel this way before. i found that very strange.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Star like light changing in color moves slowly, stops hovers, jumps around, then hovers

content.detailedDescription: Was looking up at the stars from my driveway in the night sky and within 15 seconds i saw what i thought right away was a shooting star so i was able to lock in to watch it. it was a shape. circular with 2 flat sides, was a hazy pink glow on the surface, way, way up high in the sky, it sped from east to west, no tail. what seemed like 5 seconds was probably more like 2-3. "i had the feeling of the phrase "i know what i saw" i lost sight as it sped all the way out of sight to the west horizon.
content.summary: Saw shape high in the sky speed across the entire night sky.

content.detailedDescription: I was out walking my dogs at 1940 est on 10/5/2011. shortly after taking them out, i noticed a very fast moving group of lights that came over the trees near my house.  these lights appeared to be very high in the sky.  i went into my home to grab a set of binoculars and returned outside to try to see more.  the lights which were travelling in a long pattern for me to see had already travelled 15-20 degrees in the short period of time it took me to get my bino's.  i was having a hard time seeing the object, mainly because of the speed it appeared to be travelling.  from the time i took my bino's down to see where the lights were and put my bino's back to my eyes, it was  further ahead in it's flight path. when i did manage to get a glimpse of it, it appeared to be very large, randomly flashing red and white lights in a crescent shape and had no noticable sound.  about halfway through the total time that i saw the object, i noticed another set of lights come from over the trees, appearing to be trying to follow/catch the set of lights which just simply left it further away by the second.  this second object had the noise of a jet of some sort and sequentually flashing lights like any other jet seen in the night time sky.  the total time lasted about 1 minute, but surely appeared different in the skies that any other object i saw before.
content.summary: Very fast moving large object in the sky

content.detailedDescription:
Lee���s  summit, mo.								 tuesday  7:52 pm
october 4th, 2011
i saw a u.F.O.  i do believe that we are not alone in the universe and i do believe in god. in my lifetime i have observed strange lights in the sky, i have read articles about abductions or eyewitness accounts u.F.O. sightings, and i admit to watching shows about area 51, roswell and government cover-ups. hollywood is alwys entertaining when bringing a new twist to the elusive e.T. ���s that are watching us, snatching us and performing their tests on us. i am not fanatical about the subject.
i am going to recount the events and what i saw from my balcony. many other people saw the same thing and reported it. i just want to know what it was. 
i was sitting on my balcony, talking on the phone, i looked up as this enormous, slow moving, very bright object began to move over the tree line. i said i had to go, wanted to get a picture of this & my phone was dying, so i needed to get my charger plugged in. then i stood frozen and stared. 
it was not a stealth. it was moving se, and another smaller craft (small plane, helicopter?) was moving nw. at first i thought they were going to collide, then (it seemed almost awkward) maneuvered and i remember thinking ���the little one seems panicked.��� it was not the normal amount of space between two aircraft. the little one disappeared, then count-i, 2, it flew over the top of the big one. this is when i remembered my desire for pictures and my dying phone. by the time i was back outside it had moved to the e side of downtown l.S. then my phone rang, i answered it, plugged it in, and it was gone when i got back outside. that fast!
the craft- it was at least the size of a football field. i really could not tell what the overall shape was.  it had two rows of lights that spanned the width and then under those lights were two more rows, centered, but shorter in width. there was a consistent pattern in the lights, that changed in number, becoming less at the center, but symmetrical, for example- left to right- 9, 8, 8,, 5,, 3, 4, 3,, 5,, 8, 8, 9. each number represents the uninterrupted chain of ���bulbs��� each comma represents a space.  the top two rows were identical. sizeable space, then rows three and four were solid, no interruptions. i would say they were the width of 5-5. the lights seemed brighter, whiter than the little craft���s light, but i don���t remember them changing colors or pulsing.
i didn���t see the craft flip on it���s side or disappear. what i noticed the most, frightened me most. there was no noise. not from either one. i could hear my cats playing inside, my microwave beep (my tea was done) and my neighbors talking.
my daughter was on hwy 291 with a friend. they both saw it. they had to lean over in the car to see the whole thing, it was right over them. the same daughter has chosen a caree in avaition, so we constantly watch the aircraft in the skies. this was different.
october 5th, 1:30 pm. i called ls airport, to inquire. the man who answered said he had heard nothing about this occurance, that it must be some local pilots practicing their formation routine for an upcoming event (off the record, of course.) he said that i must be mistaken, that people mistake common things (weather balloons, stray kites, etc.) all the time. i responded with ���doesn���t our local airport have a responsibility to know who is where in our skies?��� he informed me that clearly i was mistaken, thanked me for calling and hung up.
i know what i saw. i made my next call to kci. i was transferred four times to ���someone who could better answer those questions.��� number five was an air traffic control person. he listened me but said he had heard nothing of this either. i asked him to google ufo/lees summit10/04/2011. i asked how so many could see this and kci not know? i said ���if it was confidential, then say it���s confidential, and i would shut up and hang up. if it���s a really big airplane, then tell me the model, but don���t say you didn���t even know it was there!��� he reviewed radar starting at 6:00 pm. after about a minute he says��� well i see here there was something flying in our airspace, but we weren���t talking to them��� i said ���huh?��� he got quiet, then said ���oh it must be a 747 that landed at about 7:28 pm. he had nothing else to say. i thanked him and hung up.
i am not an mit hopeful. i will never be a brain surgeon. i am also not stupid. 
if it was confidential then why was it flying so slowly and so close to the ground? we all know what the stealth looks like���a weather balloon? a little more tact when insulting someone���s intelligence is in order. 
yep-it���s unexplained. yep-it looks fishy. what are they doing at our airports? answers would be awesome! i have low expectations.
content.summary: The size of a football field! silent!

content.detailedDescription: Reporting again because of the 9-24-11 report in newbury as observed from church during bingo.  the road or address where i saw my ufo and was paced by it was pekin road, which is just one block north of the church.  my report has been filed on mufon before.  there have been four other sightings along that road since 1983 that i have verified.  probably many others.  thought this would be significant since the other observation was so close to the one i had in 83', to wit, i was exiting a driveway onto pekin road, heading east, when a row of six red, white and green lights rose above the tree line to the east about 200 feet from me any hovered.  no sound as the light sequentially traveled left to right, as along a blimp ad.  used my index finger for size comparison, row of lights was the length of it.  when i turned toward them, they moved towards the road ahead and passed over me.  then there is a blank spot where i'm trying to figure out why the blimp was out here at 2am, when, after driving another mile down the road, it comes back from my left and hovers over the next intersection.  this is where i become very frightened, turn right and speed down sperry road, saying over and over, "not tonight".  as i drove, the lights paced my car about 150 feet to my right at about 40 feet off the ground over a field.  i drove as fast as possible and lost them after a mile or so.  when i traveled another two miles to the main road, mayfield, i got out and looked back, where i could still see it hovering and blinking at tree top level, about a mile or so back.  i don't' know if i was abducted, as that blank spot where i saw it over the car to where i was questioning what i had seen has never been resolved.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Hovering row of lights crosses road, changes direction and paces car

content.detailedDescription: I was out with my dog and noticed a rumbling sound , i looked  around  behind me and saw  a triangled shaped object in between me and the moon, i noticed it had 3 lights on it , 1 in the front and 1 on each corner , there was a red pulsating light in the middle .. it was going  slower than normal aircraft.. i watched it go out of sight  towards the north east
content.summary: Flew slowly from southwest to nartheast

content.detailedDescription:
I was about a mile south of cornhusker road, headed south bound on 72nd, in the town of papillion, ne. i was headed to the grocery store at the time. i first noticed the object because it was very clear out, not a cloud in the sky. this object was the only thing i could see. when i first saw it i thought it was an airplane or a jet of some kind. there is not only an airport nearby, but an air force base, so seeing objects in the sky is in no way unusual. this was not one of the usual objects, easily identifiable as planes or jets.
at first the object looked translucent, but definitely solid. it was completely smooth, and roughly the shape of a lemon. the more i looked at it, the more it looked like it has a shiny, polished surface, like a mirror finish. there were no visible lights, markings, or breaks in the surface. it looked large, but not much larger than what a fighter jet would look like, but i have no way of knowing how far away it actually was. it was moving when i first saw it, heading swiftly in a straight line towards the south-south-west. it continued in this direction for a minute or two, until it vanished from my sight. it didn't go beyond the horizon, it just sort of vanished. 
when i realized it was something unfamiliar, at first i felt a little curious, then excited. it's something i've always found fascinating, but never assumed i would ever see something like it.
content.summary: I was driving south, when i spotted a strange object in the sky. it flew south--south-west before disappearing.

content.detailedDescription: While standing on my porch facing eastward, i look to the north east , near the east side foothills, as if i was looking towards milpitas. i see this "star" that is changing colors. i blink a few times to see if my vision is tired or blurred... but thisw continues and is still view able. last night the clouds covered my veiw- as this object had to be higher then the clouds last night. this object changes from one to two stars very close together and at the same time changes colors from white blue to red and then green and back to light white blue. i dosent move location, other then shape change.
content.shape: Circle,   Diamond,   Flash,   Oval,   Saturn-like,   Sphere,   Star-like
content.summary: Party planet?

content.detailedDescription:
I was around 10 to 12 years old, but the image is still vivid in my mind. it was around 9 or 10pm i think, i am also not sure of the month or year, but it was completely dark and could not of been after 11pm at night. 
i believe it was during the school winter holidays or on the weekend due to how late i was up that night. 
i also kept having strange dreams after i saw the object. this was not the first time i saw a ufo, but it was the most spetacular.
it was huge. it seemed to cover almost the whole sky. it looked light a search light, but with a solid surface where you couldn't see the stars. it also seemed to have a hazy light around it.
seeing this image seems very important, but i am not sure why. recently i have been having strange ideas. it is like my mind is trying to figure something out, but i'm not sure what. it has to do with math, science and energy.

beat beat string up, beat beat string up
string down, string down, beat, beat, long string beat down
this is just part of what i see. it seems jumbled.

not sure what else, have to sleep on it. just had to get this off my chest. not sure what it means.

there is more, but not sure about it.
